attributes.action: Give all NHS staff a lump sum tax free cash bonus and a guarenteed pay rise.
attributes.additional_details: All NHS staff have worked under extreme circumstances during the civic 19 pandemic and placed themselves in harm to protect our nation.
attributes.background: Guarentee all NHS workers will receive a tax free cash bonus and a Guranteed Pay Rise.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
